TopicTitle: Stupid Industry's Historical What If? Division.

Articles.Content:
This division of stupid industry's has produced two packs of craft for your enjoyment.

Pack One:

an assembled Mir station, ready for hyperediting or to look at for construction guidance. There is also a assembled Salut 6 station for sending up in one piece on proton/hyperedit.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/nvqdm1eq8d10nbr/Russian%20Stations%20Pack.zip

Pack Two:

Three seperate dockable crafts for a soviet mission to mars that I made up. Requires ORDA.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/655t4umhkdgvh1x/Mir%20Duna.zip

Assembly/Use Instructions

1.send up the core module, should fit in a proton.

2. Send up the science module(should also fit on proton), dock it to the top docking port.

3. Send up the propulsion module( might fit on the side of energia but I haven't tryed to) dock it to the other end.

4. Send the whole stack towards a planet of your choice(recomend minmus MÃƒÂ¼n or eve).

Pics:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Required mods

Both packs require bobcats soviet pack for .20.2

Pack Two Requires ORDA in addition to the soviet pack.it also requires the ISS pack for the science modules main body( the ISS packs Zarya FGB)

Misc Info:

all crafts go in the VAB folder.

post comments?critique below.

Edited July 11, 2013 by DarthVader

Anyone? How do you like them?

Edited June 23, 2013 by DarthVader
OP made cleaner looking, assembly instructions included for pack two
With tomorrow you mean this day or zhe next one...Im waiting

Nice looking! I wonder if there would be enough food/water/oxygen for a single kerbonaut to get to duna and stay there until the next ship arrives :/ Maybe add a Kvant-1 at the top?Everyone loves Kvant-1

Nah, the kerbs have all the space they need in the core/FGB, adding a kvant would only make it longer and harder to control, its fairly hard to control as it is.

divmoski: have you built the entire ship in orbit yet?
Has anyone actually used the Mir Duna ship? Could you make a video review of it?
Im sorry, Im short on time, no time tto orbit a single segment.Ive got my own design anyway.
